name: wingman
content:
wingman noun [C]
(PILOT)
Add to word list
Add to word list
a pilot whose plane is flying behind and to the side of a plane that is leading a group of planes flying together

wingman noun [C]
(FRIEND)
a friend who supports you, especially a man who supports another man when trying to meet or talk to possible partners: In these kinds of situations it always helps to have a good wingman.

wingman noun [C]
(SPORTS)
a player in the wing (= side) position in some team games
